instances.prompt: An ultra realistic high-quality 4k professional stock photography. The image should feature a young adult of indistinct gender and ethnicity holding a credit card with a stylized, growth-oriented design (subtly representing "Crece") and smiling. They are in a bright, modern setting, perhaps a home office or a vibrant cafe, looking towards the camera with a sense of optimism and accomplishment. The lighting is cheerful and natural, emphasizing growth and opportunity. The visual should convey a feeling of positive financial progress and achievement.

parameters.negativePrompt: Examples include disfigurements, six fingers per hand, low realism, lack of coherence, low-resolution images, grainy textures, lack of detail, abnormal appearances, illegible text, and grammatical and syntax errors. There are also non-coherent situations, distorted human and/or animal bodies, figures, and objects; devices with more than one screen; screens popping out of devices, such as laptops and mobile phones; and people belonging to only one ethnicity
